45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Abu Ayyub Ansiri reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:It is not permissible for a Muslim to have estranged relations with his brother beyond three nights, the one turning one way and the other turning the other way when they meet; the better of the two is one who is the first to give a greeting

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ الْهَجْرِ فَوْقَ ثَلاَثٍ بِلاَ عُذْرٍ شَرْعِيٍّ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Forsaking Someone For More Than Three Days For No Legitimate Reason
